question: Which of the following represents non-uniform motion?
option1: equal displacements in unequal intervals of time
option2: unequal displacements in unequal intervals of time
option3: equal displacements in equal intervals of time
option4: unequal displacements in equal intervals of time
answer: equal displacements in unequal intervals of time
explanation: An object is said to be in non-uniform motion if it undergoes equal displacements in unequal intervals of time. In non-uniform motion, the velocity is different at different instants.
